name: Extreme Boat Racing -Power of Turbo,Speed,Thumb Boat free Racing game for kids
name_original: Extreme Boat Racing -Power of Turbo,Speed,Thumb Boat free Racing game for kids
description:
Go Boat Racing with the best Speed Boat Racing game in store to do advantures in ocen waves.Boat Racing game holds the set of rough seas and Large Collection of Boats That it gives the thrill to the user.there are many hurdles and coin point between the journey of the destinatination.collect the coin that is useful to grow score and share your score with your friend.
Game has many exciting features:-

-Realistic 2D graphics in realistic sea waters.
-Collect Excellometer to grow the speed of Boat.
-unlimited speed and fun to enjoy the boat ride in the sea.
-nice and realistic sound effects.

How to Play:

-Press left and right side of the road to move Boat.
-Beware of the Devil Boats and the hurdle. that will decrease the speed of your boat.
-Collect the Fuel for the long go ahed and keep going.
-Collect the Ecellometer that will increse the speed of the Boat.
